foot_6.title: 6-Foot Giant Sandwiches
foot_6.description: Designed to fulfuill any sized appetite! Served with choice of meat or cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, mayo, and mustard.

sandwich_wraps_platters.title: Sandwich Platter - 18&#34
sandwich_wraps_platters.description: Twenty-one 3in rolls. Your choice of ham, hard salami, turkey, roast beef, tuna. Served with your choice of swiss, cheddar, provolone, pepper jack, or mozzarella.

sandwich_wraps_platters.title: Wraps Platter - Choice of Spinach or Spicy Tomato
sandwich_wraps_platters.description: Your choice of ham, hard salami, turkey, roast beef, tuna. Served with your choice of cheddar, provolone, or swiss cheese. Lettuce, tomato, mayo, and mustard included.

lunch_boxes.title: Basic Box
lunch_boxes.description: Great for smaller parties and meetings or parties with BIG appetites. 4-5inch rolls served with your choice of ham, turkey, hard salami, roast beef, and cheese. Also included per box: Bag of potato chips and a canned soda.

lunch_boxes.title: Deluxe Box
lunch_boxes.description: Your choice of white, wheat, sourdough, or rye bread. Your choice of ham, turkey, hard salami, or roast beef. Served with your choice of cheddar, provolone, or swiss cheese. Lettuce, tomato, mayo, and mustard included. Also included per box: Small side of potato salad, macaroni salad, or coleslaw. Bag of potato chips, cookie, and a canned soda.

lunch_boxes.title: Premium San Diego Beach Box
lunch_boxes.description: A large croissant loaded with your choice of ham, turkey, hard salami, or roast beef. Lettuce, tomato, mayo, and mustard included. Also included per box: A side of hummus, bottle of water or a canned soda, bag of potato chips, cookie, and a side of caesar salad with Italian dressing.

lunch_boxes.title: Executive Box
lunch_boxes.description: Your choice of bread (white, wheat, sourdough, rye) or wrap (spinach, spicy tomato). Any special from the menu (see attached menu), a side of Greek salad, your choice between macaroni salad, potato salad, or coleslaw, bag of potato chips, candy, cookie, and a canned sooda.

breakfast_platters.title: Bagel Platter
breakfast_platters.description: Your choice between plain, jalapeno, cinnamon raisin, onion, or everythign bagels.
breakfast_platters.special: Smaller size available. Packages of cream cheese included, butter & jellies also available.

breakfast_platters.title: Breakfast Box
breakfast_platters.description: A mini croissant loaded with scrambled eggs, cheese, and your choice of ham, sausage, or bacon. also included: A side of fruit (apple or banana), plain or flavor yogurt, water bottle or can of soda, and your choice between a muffin or a cookie.

breakfast_platters.title: Croissant Platter
breakfast_platters.description: Hard boiled egg, cheese, and ham with croissants.

breakfast_platters.title: Pastries Platter
breakfast_platters.description: Your choice between freshly made raspberry twists, nutella twists, strawberry puffs, or cinnamon rolls.

breakfast_platters.title: Fruit Platter
breakfast_platters.description: A variety of seasonal fruits to give you an extra boost of energy.

Party_Platters.title: International Cheese Platter - 18&#34
Party_Platters.description: Crackers served with your choice of swiss, cheddar, provolone, pepper jack, or mozzarella.

Party_Platters.title: American Vitiate Meat Platter - 18&#34
Party_Platters.description: Your choice of ham, hard salami, turkey, roast beef, and mortadela.

Party_Platters.title: Vegetable Platter - 18&#34
Party_Platters.description: Includes broccoli, cauliflower, baby carrots, celery sticks, cucumbers, green peppers, red peppers, creamy ranch dip, and grape tomatoes.

Party_Platters.title: Salad Tray - Choice of Chicken, Greek, Tuna, or Caesar
Party_Platters.description: All trays include: Romaine lettuce, pepperoncinis, onion, tomato, and cucumbers.
Party_Platters.special: Macaroni salad, potato salad, pasta salad, and coleslaw available upon request.

Beverage_Packages.title: Bottle Water or Juice Service
Beverage_Packages.description: Your choice of water or juice served ice cold.

Beverage_Packages.title: Soda Pop Service
Beverage_Packages.description: Your choice of 15-20oz bottles of Pepsi, Coca Cola, or 7 Up.
